markdownRemark.html:
Presenter: Dr. Amy Douglas & Dr. Frieda Jorgensen

Dr. Amy Douglas is a senior star epidemiologist in PHE specialising on campylobacter and norovirus surveillance.

Dr. Frieda Jorgensen is a senior food microbiologist at the PHE Food Water and Environmental Microbiology Lab at Porton. She has a special focus on zoonotic infections with particular interest in Campylobacters, Salmonella and STEC. She has led on several FSA funded studies especially concerned with monitoring Campylobacters in retail chicken.
